suggestions.suggestion: Run end-of-week portfolio risk assessment. Rebalance exposure on BTC/ETH pair trades based on Thursday volatility spike.
suggestions.result: Portfolio rebalanced. Reduced BTC long exposure by 8%, added ETH hedge.

suggestions.suggestion: Deploy hotfix for AxeCap terminal WebSocket reconnection bug. Users reporting dropped connections after 30min idle.
suggestions.result: Hotfix deployed. WebSocket keep-alive interval reduced to 15s, reconnect logic hardened.

suggestions.suggestion: Finalize brand color palette for Biz-in-a-Box v2 landing page. Deliver Figma mockups for hero section.
suggestions.result: Figma mockups delivered. Hero section uses new gradient palette with amber/purple accent.

suggestions.suggestion: Compile intelligence brief on new AI agent marketplace competitors launched this week. Focus on pricing models.
suggestions.result: Brief delivered. 3 new competitors identified, none with real-time trading integration.

suggestions.suggestion: Reorganize agent memory files and archive stale daily logs older than 7 days. Update coordination protocols.
suggestions.result: Memory cleanup done. 23 stale files archived. Coordination doc updated.

2026-02-12.notes: Full sweep night. All agents delivered. Bobby's rebalance was critical — volatility spike nearly triggered stop-loss.

suggestions.suggestion: Backtest new momentum strategy on SOL/USDT 15m candles. Compare Sharpe ratio against current live strategy.
suggestions.result: Backtest complete. New strategy Sharpe 1.42 vs current 1.18. Recommending paper trade for 48h before live.

suggestions.suggestion: Implement server-side caching layer for market data API. Current cold-start latency is 2.3s, target under 500ms.
suggestions.result: Redis caching layer deployed. Cold-start now 380ms. Cache invalidation on 30s TTL for price data.

suggestions.suggestion: Design agent avatar system for OS dashboard. Each agent needs a consistent visual identity across all views.
suggestions.result: Avatar system designed. SVG-based with color-coded borders matching agent brand colors.

suggestions.suggestion: Monitor overnight crypto regulatory news feeds. Flag any SEC/CFTC announcements affecting DeFi or stablecoin positions.
suggestions.result: No material regulatory actions overnight. EU MiCA implementation timeline updated in intel doc.

suggestions.suggestion: Review all agent cron schedules for conflicts. Two agents hitting the same API endpoint simultaneously caused rate-limiting yesterday.
suggestions.result: Cron schedules staggered. Bobby shifted to :05, Dwight to :15. No more collisions.

2026-02-13.notes: Clean night. Bobby's backtest results look promising — watch the paper trade results tomorrow.

suggestions.suggestion: Analyze pre-market futures positioning and options flow for Valentine's Day trading session. Low volume expected — adjust position sizing down 20%.
Rewire overnight planning page from mock data to persistent JSON storage. Add API routes for CRUD operations on daily plans.
Create Valentine's Day themed social media assets for DBTech brand. Subtle, on-brand — not cheesy.
Deep dive on OpenAI's latest model release announcements. Assess impact on our agent architecture and potential migration paths.
Review and update agent coordination protocols. Prepare weekly summary of all agent outputs for Derek's Monday review.
